{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:53.880

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:30.880

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:04.880
    | text      = But circumstances surrounding that hoax are actually kind of fascinating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:08.880
    | text      = In 2008 excavators working on prepping for road construction in Kurdistan accidentally
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:15.880
    | text      = uncovered an Iron Age graveyard with more than 20 intact graves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:20.880

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:23.880
    | text      = of burial goods and plenty for researchers to learn from the graves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:27.880
    | text      = According to a report co-produced by Ghent University,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:30.880
    | text      = quote, within a week, however, a hoax was created around this discovery that gained
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:34.880
    | text      = worldwide momentum through blogs and websites.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:37.880
    | text      = Reports and press releases began mentioning the discovery of six corpses instead of five
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:41.880
    | text      = and they became a mummified king and five of his bodyguards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:45.880
    | text      = The media frenzy was supported by a 36-second video fragment that was placed on YouTube
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:50.880
    | text      = and various other sites.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:51.880
    | text      = It is the orchestrated discovery of a bearded mummified king with a crown,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:55.880
    | text      = a gem-encrusted gold box and two gems encrusted gold plates with cuneiform inscriptions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:02.880
    | text      = The forgery was so crude that no professional archaeologist could ever be fooled by it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:06.880
    | text      = But many, many others were, and unfortunately such Indiana Jones-style stories
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:11.880

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:15.880
    | text      = We hope this preliminary report may, for once and all, put an end to the speculations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = and conspiracy stories related to this hoax.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:22.880
    | text      = That paper came out in 2012 and, best as I can tell, it did not end the speculation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Oh, Nannar.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:31.880
    | text      = Here's that paper.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:32.880
    | text      = This sort of thing happens a lot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:33.880
    | text      = A large section of the space weirdo community, particularly those at the top of the pyramid,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:36.880
    | text      = are scammers who know that nothing is ever going to prove what their arguments say are true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:41.880
    | text      = So the best they can do is piggyback any real archaeological discovery
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:44.880
    | text      = and try and co-opt it into their world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:47.880
    | text      = This behavior manifests in a dozen different ways.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:49.880
    | text      = You see it here with this hoax mummy video attempting to co-opt this graveyard that was found in Iran.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:56.880
    | text      = You see it with the insistence that there's a cover-up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:58.880
    | text      = Like when mainline archaeologists won't admit there was an Anunnaki in that tomb,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:05.880
    | text      = The same sort of thinking is what's behind Kerry arguing that things like ISIS was created
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:10.880
    | text      = so that the New World Order can go around and destroy monuments in the Middle East,
}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's all about co-opting reality in such a way as to deceptively elevate your ideas
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:23.880
    | text      = and give masking to why you can't prove any of the things you say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:26.880
    | text      = It's a good grift because you don't even have to work that hard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:28.880
    | text      = Oh, it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:29.880
    | text      = It is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:30.880
    | text      = It is.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = in pain or struggling, especially with her comments about the alienation that she felt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:27.600
    | text      = I definitely empathize, and I don't want it to feel like I'm beaten up on her or anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:34.680
    | text      = I sat with these thoughts and I considered them, and I decided that if I allow that excuse
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:39.039
    | text      = for Emily, I kind of have to allow it for everybody on Project Camelot.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Literally everybody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:44.100
    | text      = She's lucid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:53.600

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:57.720
    | text      = do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:58.720
    | text      = While we can maybe read from context clues that she's felt a serious alienation from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = people in her life and that's led her to adopt some elements of a fantasy life that she feels

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:09.520
    | text      = I spent three years isolating myself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:13.840

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:26.920

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:35.600

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:42.680

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:46.939

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:27:52.760

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:08.039
    | text      = I believe that it's important to treat people who fall in with these ideologies with a great

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:12.520

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:15.479
    | text      = However, I also believe that the world we see in front of us, we can't allow compassion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:20.199
    | text      = to entirely blind us to the reality that a lot of the time, people who enter ideologies
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:24.920
    | text      = because of motivations we can empathize with often end up becoming disseminators of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:29.699
    | text      = very same ideologies, which is a behavior that cannot be empathized with.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:34.720
    | text      = What tipped the scales for me was when I was looking to see if I could find Emily's books
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:38.560

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:41.760
    | text      = I couldn't find any PDFs or any real reviews of her books, but I did find her blog.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:28:47.640
    | text      = What particularly caught my eye was a March 27th, 2015 post entitled, quote, what is a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:03.720

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:04.720
    | text      = And that's where the lineage traces down from.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:07.039

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = and quote, do not have the gifts that God Yahweh gave to the seed of Abraham.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = She closes the post by saying, quote, I'm sorry, but you don't know your history very
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:20.520

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:21.520
    | text      = And that's why the Anunnaki had red hair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:23.960
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:24.960
    | text      = That's why there was a red beard there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:26.720
    | text      = Perhaps.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:27.760
    | text      = So she's espousing British Israelite beliefs, she's espousing Christian identity beliefs,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:33.399
    | text      = she's perpetuating these things, and even if she got sucked into this stuff, I would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:58.020
    | text      = But Project Camelot still has a much larger audience than us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:20.159

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:45.439
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:46.439
    | text      = I think.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:10.579

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:17.520

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:33.600

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:52.000
    | text      = So I understand your defensive position absolutely, but also, fuck her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:58.439
    | text      = What I'm trying to express is I think that the overarching empathy is a guiding principle.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
